title: Cédric Faivre
text:
Cédric Faivre (born April 8, 1981 in <a href="Montb%C3%A9liard">Montbéliard</a>) is a French professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. Currently, he plays in the <a href="Championnat%20de%20France%20amateur">Championnat de France amateur</a> for <a href="SR%20Colmar">SR Colmar</a>.
He played on the professional level in <a href="Ligue%201">Ligue 1</a> for <a href="Troyes%20AC">Troyes AC</a> and <a href="Ligue%202">Ligue 2</a> for <a href="FC%20Sochaux-Montb%C3%A9liard">FC Sochaux-Montbéliard</a> and Troyes AC.
